pages.title: What is Siteleaf?
pages.body: Siteleaf is a content management system that publishes static files.

pages.title: Where does Siteleaf publish?
pages.body: Siteleaf can publish to FTP, Amazon S3, Rackspace Cloud Files, or Siteleaf’s own free CDN hosting.

pages.title: Which template system does Siteleaf use?
Which websites are built with Siteleaf?
pages.body:
Here is a list of websites built with Siteleaf:

  • Siteleaf.com marketing site
  • Destroy Today
  • Caf√© Jonnie
  • Sawyer Hollenshead
  • Bar Lawrence
  • Newswordy

pages.title: What is Siteleaf's stack?
pages.body: Siteleaf is written in Ruby. The web app is built on the Sinatra framework and its API is built on Grape.

pages.title: Is it true that Sawyer is only 16 years old?
pages.body: Sawyer claims he is 23 years old, but we’ve never seen a birth certificate.
